short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: ⭐ 简约且美观的新选项卡扩展，可与多功能框无缝交互
short.en: ⭐ A minimalist and aesthetically pleasing new tab extension that seamlessly interacts with the omnibox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
⭐ Bubble起始页是一个简约且美观的新选项卡扩展，可与多功能框无缝交互
🔑支持自定义多个搜索引擎，并通过key快捷搜索
📌添加omnibox关键词，可以实现与起始页相同的搜索体验
🎈优雅的深色模式，以及页面动画
🧩可选的天气卡片，一言卡片

🧱使用':key'这样的格式，即可使用设置里指定的搜索引擎进行搜索，拓展已经自带了一些常用的搜索引擎，例如Google,Github等
🖇️例如在搜索框输入':gg '后即可使用google进行搜索，':git '使用Github进行搜索
long.en:
⭐ The Bubble New Tab is a minimalist and aesthetically pleasing new tab extension that seamlessly interacts with multi-function boxes.
🔑 Supports customizing multiple search engines, and quick search through keys.
📌 Add omnibox keywords to achieve the same search experience as the start page.
🎈 Elegant dark mode, and page animations.
🧩 Optional weather card, one-word card.

🧱 By using the format ':key', you can use the search engine specified in the settings for searching. The extension has already come with some commonly used search engines, such as Google, Github, etc.
🖇️ For example, if you enter ':gg ' in the search box, you can use Google to search, ':git ' to use Github to search.
